name: sys::process::unix::common::Command::new

core::convert::AsRef::as_ref.doc: Converts this type into a shared reference of the (usually inferred) input type.

sys::process::unix::common::cstring_arra.doc:
Creates a new `CStringArray` with enough capacity to hold `capacity`
 strings.
Push an additional string to the array.

alloc_crate::vec::Vec::<T>::new.doc:
Constructs a new, empty `Vec<T>`.

 The vector will not allocate until elements are pushed onto it.

 # Examples

 ```
 # #![allow(unused_mut)]
 let mut vec: Vec<i32> = Vec::new();
 ```
